authors: Pamela Pfeifer, MSN, is Nursing Coordinator, University Hospital, Madison, Wisconsin. Christine Vandenhouten, PhD, RN, APHN-BC, CPH, is Associate Professor, Professional Program in Nursing, University of Wisconsin-Green Bay, Green Bay, Wisconsin. Suzanne Purvis, DNP, GCNS-BC, is Geriatric Clinical Nurse Specialist, University Hospital, Madison, Wisconsin. Tamara Zupanc, DNP, CCRN, is Nursing Education Specialist-Medical, University Hospital, Madison, Wisconsin.
journal: Journal for nurses in professional development
title: The Impact of Education on Certified Nursing Assistants' Identification of Strategies to Manage Behaviors Associated With Dementia.
